title: 001 - Kenn Kington
description:
It's the inaugural episode of Tim Hawkins' Poddy Break. Tim is joined by long time friend and comedian Kenn Kington. They wax poetic on direct mailers, YouTube vs Facebook, connecting with the audience and the best way to make a three bean salad.  Check out more of Kenn at http://www.kennkington.com
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Tim Hawkins
itunes:subtitle: Kenn takes Tim's comedy to the next level.

content:encoded:
It's the inaugural episode of Tim Hawkins' Poddy Break. Tim is joined by long time friend and comedian Kenn Kington. They wax poetic on direct mailers, YouTube vs Facebook, connecting with the audience and the best way to make a three bean salad.

Check out more of Kenn at http://www.kennkington.com
